description:
Uzume and the others set up a curry shop with the Card club. Uzume is very busy because she also has to deal with her Tennis club and class projects. But a girl wearing a china dress shows up targeting Uzume after receiving instructions from the mysterious Foundation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Onion On On: A Fair of Culture?
玉ねぎたまたま 文化の祭り?
